NK106(me)007:1: // rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso'i don khrid snying po bcud bsdus zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK106(me)007:2: 'od gsal ba yi ye shes ni //
NK106(me)007:3: sems kyi dam pa la btud nas //
NK106(me)007:4: dri med rang bzhin dag pa yi //
NK106(me)007:5: sgom pa'i snying po 'dir brjod bya //
NK106(me)007:6: dang por stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
NK106(me)007:8: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang /
NK106(me)007:9: sems can la tshad med pa'i snying rjes sems bskyed pa dang /
NK106(me)007:10: snang srid 'og min tu gsal zhing rang lus rdo
NK106(me)007:11: rje sems dpa' 'ja' tshon lta bu rdo rje dang
NK106(me)007:13: yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa dang /
NK106(me)007:14: spyi bor pad zla nyi ma'i dbus su bla ma
NK106(me)007:15: kun 'dus kun tu bzang po yab yum gyi rnam
NK106(me)007:17: rdo rje skyil krung dang mnyam gzhag mdzad pa las 'od zer mu med pa 'phros te /
NK106(me)007:18: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad longs sku'i zhing du bsgom zhing /
NK106(me)007:19: rtsa ba dang brgyud pa'i bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad thim par bsam zhing /
NK106(me)007:20: gnas lugs kyi rtogs pa rgyud la skye bar gsol
NK106(me)007:21: ba btab pa'i rim pa rnams la nyin zhag gsum
NK106(me)007:22: gsum ste zla ba phyed du blo sbyong ngo //
NK106(me)007:25: dang po bde ba'i 'od gsal ni /
NK106(me)007:26: lus skyil krung gi pus por thal mo gnyis bkab la /
NK106(me)007:27: rlung phyir bus pa'i rjes la dal bus nang du rngubs te /
NK106(me)007:28: rtsa gsum 'khor lo bzhi gsal ba'i lte bar a
NK106(me)007:29: dmar po las me 'bar ba spyi bo'i ham dkar
NK106(me)007:30: po la phog pas bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pa snying
NK106(me)007:31: dbus kyi bam sngo skya la phog pas bde phri
NK106(me)007:32: li li byung bar bsams la /
NK106(me)007:33: bde ba ma skyes kyi bar du bsgom mo //
NK106(me)007:34: skyes nas bam de nyid je phrar gyur nas mthar
NK106(me)007:35: mi dmigs pa'i ngang du sems glod nas bsgoms pas
NK106(me)007:36: / bde stong spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes nyin zhag gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)007:37: gnyis pa gsal ba'i 'od gsal ni lus gnad dang rtsa gnas de dang 'dra ba las /
NK106(me)007:38: ro rkyang gi nang nas rlung tshur rngubs dus snang
NK106(me)007:39: srid 'khor 'das thams cad 'od du zhu ba snying
NK106(me)007:40: ga'i dbus kyi 'od lnga'i gong bu la thim pas
NK106(me)007:41: gsal stong gi ye shes skyes par bsams la /
NK106(me)007:42: rlung kha sbyar te snying gar gzung zhing dal bus
NK106(me)007:43: rlung rngubs bya zhing mthar je phra je chung mi
NK106(me)007:44: dmigs pa'i ngang du glod la bsgoms pas /
NK106(me)007:45: nyin zhag gsum nas gsal stong mi rtog pa'i 'od gsal 'char ro //
NK106(me)007:46: gsum pa mi rtog pa'i 'od gsal ni /
NK106(me)007:47: lus gnad 'dra ba la sems gnad kyis 'phang ba ni /
NK106(me)007:48: snying gar a dkar po 'od 'phro ba bsam ste /
NK106(me)007:49: ha nyer gcig gis spyi bo nas nam mkha'i dbyings su stong ste /
NK106(me)007:50: dran pa rang yal gyi ngang der bzhag pas /
NK106(me)007:51: rtog med gsal ba'i ye shes skye'o //
NK106(me)007:52: gzung ba ni gnam dngas pa'i tshe nyi ma la rgyab gtad de nam mkha'i ngang der bltas la /
NK106(me)007:53: sems ma yengs par bzhag pas mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye'o //
NK106(me)007:55: nam mkha' la gtad nas sa rdo ri brag la
NK106(me)007:56: sogs pa'i snang ba rnams la rim gyis bltas pas
NK106(me)007:57: / dngos po med pa nam mkha' ltar gyur /
NK106(me)007:58: rang gi lus kyang nam mkha' ltar gyur /
NK106(me)007:59: phyi nang bar gsum nam mkha' gyur te dbyer med
NK106(me)007:60: nam mkha'i ngang la mi g.yo zhing ma yengs par
NK106(me)007:62: chos thams cad rtog med ye grol chen po /
NK106(me)007:63: gdod ma'i gnas lugs ka dag blo zad chen po'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)007:64: dngos gzhi 'od gsal gyi gdams pa'o //
NK106(me)007:65: rjes ni gang la'ang 'dzin zhen med pas skye med
NK106(me)007:66: thug phrad du rtsal sbyangs pa la bslab par bya'o
NK106(me)007:67: // de ltar bde gsal rnam par rtog med kyi //
NK106(me)007:68: 'od gsal nyams myong yi ger bkod pa yi //
NK106(me)007:69: dge bas 'gro kun sems nyid don rtogs nas //
NK106(me)007:70: mi gnas gdod ma'i chos sku thob par shog /
NK106(me)007:71: yang zab snying po 'od gsal ye shes gnad //
NK106(me)007:72: bla ma'i gsung bzhin nyams su myong ba rnams //
NK106(me)007:73: gangs ri thod dkar mgul du bdag gis ni //
NK106(me)007:74: legs par bshad de legs bshad rgyas gyur cig //
NK106(me)007:75: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso'i don khrid
NK106(me)007:76: snying po bcud bsdus dri med 'od zer gyis mdzad
